message: MUST READ: RT @kkozmic: This is my ultimate IoC container blogpost. Hopefully I managed to capture the points I wanted to make http://t.co/gPyrvMtc
name: IoC container solves a problem you might not have but it’s a nice problem to have | Krzysztof Koźmic

description: IoC container solves a problem you might not have but it's a nice problem to havePosted byKrzysztofunderDesign,IoCOctober 23rd, 2012On frame­works and librariesA log­ging frame­work helps you log what's hap­pen­ing in your appli­ca­tion. A UIframe­work helps you ren­der and ani­mate UIs to the user....

data.message: In case you don't know him, the writer of the post is the guy behind Castle Windsor container. Trust me, he knows this stuff very damn well!
Just watch out for fat constructor parameters and dangling objects due to misconfigurations
Yeah, mixing transient objects with long living ones can be quite tricky, and pretty much leads to the quote included at the very beginning of the post.
